name: Boucherie West Village
address: 99 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014, USA

reviews.text: We went to Boucherie to celebrate my girlfriendâ€™s birthday and they were kind enough to offer us a desert! The food was really good, we had the onion soup and the lobster linguine. Turgut was amazing during the service, very kind and always making sure nothing was missing.
Great for dinner plans ğŸ’• Turgut provided excellent service
Super busy restaurant with a great vibe. Great service. Cocktails were tasty and came out quick. Ordered the steak frites and it had a great flavor and was cooked perfectly. Overall a great meal.
Yusuf was a stellar server and bud. Super attentive, kind, funny and personable. He made our anniversary dinner so special. ğŸ–¤
Great place to have dinner. Food was amazing and Yusuf was the best! Must visit if you are in NYC
Yusuf was amazing. We had a fabulous meal with family in town.so glad we went here.
Yusuf was a great waiter!
French onion soup to die for! Shoutout to Yusuf who took great care of us
Great spot for dinner, great atmosphere, French onion soup was amazing and Yusuf have impeccable service throughout
10/10 would come back just for Yusuf
Food was amazing. Great service. Jamon was our server; super friendly and personable. He knows the cuisine well.  Canâ€™t wait to go back. Our 12 year old loved the steak and frites.
Lola was completely amazing as captain, she gave us great recommendations and the dinner was great!
Yusef was efficient and very pleasant!
Yusuf was a great server and made the experience lovely for my husband, brother, and I.
Yusuf was an amazing server. We had a fabulous brunch!
Yusuf was a great server! Great brunch.
I love Turgut ! Best waiter ever
Turgurt was hilarious and so awesome. Phenomenal waiter.
Yusufâ€™s service was as good as the profiteroles!
Yusuf youâ€™re the guy, excellent service
It was my wifeâ€™s birthday, and Turgut, our waiter was phenomenal and made our experience here incredible.
Had a wonderful dinner here on my birthday. Turgut, our server, was wonderful. The crÃ¨me brule and the mushroom ravioli were excellent.
Turgut
We loved eating at Blucherie. Turgut was a wonderful server.
Couldnâ€™t say nicer things about this restaurant. Yaman is lovely! Highly recommend the wagyu carpaccio.
Turgut was amazing ğŸ¤© had a great lunch and wonderful service.
Thank you, Fernando!! Everything ğŸ’¯.
We had a great experience for lunch. Food was great. Service was on point. We were served by Yaman who was great!

The kitchen showed skill that left us genuinely amazed. You can count on a good meal here. Service here is consistently excellent. All my meal selections have been successful. Delicious selections in a thoughtful space...
The hostess, the manager, Yusuf! Allllll amazing. I wanted a steak and had been half through Manhattan before finding Boucherie. Itâ€™s a gem! Go, you wonâ€™t be disappointed!
Yusuf was very friendly and helpful with recommendations. Everything was great
Thank you Yusuf you made our night great. Exceptional service.
Yusuf provided great service. Will be coming back. Thanks Yusuf
Boucherie is always reliable for a nice dinner. We recently dined with Yusuf who was friendly and attentive. Looking forward to coming back again soon.
Turgut was a great server.  Lots of fun

Turgut was amazing - he  created a very welcoming atmosphere and a very memorable experience
Food was delicious ğŸ¤¤
YUSUF, was our server, I must say he was the best. My first time at a French restaurant and he help me through the menu and made My Grandson birthday celebration so special!
Yusuf , thank you so much for you hospitality! Your service was awesome.
Great meal, ambiance and service at this Boucherie location. Turgut was attentive and our food and drinks came out quickly. Not to miss in the west village!
Thank you Turgut! You were fantastic and the duck was too!
Genial servicio, camareros encantadores.La comida podrÃ­a ser mejorable.
Gran ambiente, local sÃºper agradable, y lo mejor el servicio de yusuf.
Yusuf was amazing. So friendly so sweet!  Our meal was paced well and we appreciated the dessert for my daughter's 16th birthday!!!

Absolutely tasteful! Our very 1st time here under this chain restaurant. "Yusuf was a great server who gave us a few recommendations on the menu. Everything was seasoned very well and cooked to perfection . A lot of  the selections on the menu seem to have such a good flavor. The dessert was also spectacular!
Boucherie is well known and a well visited corner restaurant in the West Village. Always amazes me that for how big and how bustling it always is, how they manage to make it feel quaint and intimate.
The best waiter is Yusuf. He took great care of us on my birthday and even offered complementary dessert. Will come again. Steak is great too.
Very good food and atmosphere! All delicious. Special thanks to Yusuf, who made our experience so amazing!!
Yusuf WAS THE BESST!!!!
YUSEF was amazing!!!
Yusuf was an amazing person! I would 100% recommend going there if youâ€™re hungry.

- We made a reservation. But they couldn't find my name. So I had to prove it, but they even checked CCTVs. And they gave us too narrow and tight seats. And I stung a Christmas tree and asked for it to be fixed, but they didn't do anything about it And they didn't clearly confirm my order. So I got different coffee and menu again and again. This restaurant was so terrible and stressful. I don't want to come back here. Never.

Beautiful French restaurant in Lower Manhattan. We went there on a random Monday in the afternoon before we caught our flights and the service staff was so welcoming. I ordered a mocktail which was delicious considering no alcohol was included. The steak frites also didnâ€™t disappoint. Mightâ€™ve been the best steak Iâ€™ve had in a while. The value for your money was just top tier. I also want to commend them on the anticipatory service I received. They were very prompt which made our experience quite seamless. There was only problem at the end our lunch. They couldnâ€™t find our check for few minutes which is why I deducted a star. However, other than that small blip, its definitely a place worth checking out

We had an amazing brunch experience at Boucherie! Everything was perfect from the food to the atmosphere. The escargot was absolutely delicious, and Yusuf made our visit unforgettable with his outstanding service. Highly recommend getting the mimosas, theyâ€™re a must!
Yusef was amazing. Having on been at this place for a short time, he was very knowledgeable and had great recommendations. We will be visiting again soon. Thank you for a great meal.

Awesome atmosphere and great service. We went in around 6:15 on a Saturday, and while the music was a bit loud at first, it definitely added to the fun vibe of the place. From appetizers to main dishes, everything we had was excellent. My girlfriend had the ribeye, and I got another steak (forget the exact cut), but it was cooked perfectly and tasted amazing.

One of our friends got the cauliflower dish with pesto as a main, and I was genuinely surprised by how good it was. I usually need meat in every meal, but that cauliflower was next-level â€” I absolutely loved it. The fish also looked great, and our friend who ordered it said it was really good.

Overall, a fantastic experience with a lively atmosphere, delicious food, and solid cocktail options. Would definitely go back.

So thankful for the hostesses in finding my small group a place to enjoy good company, good food, and good times together.

Especially as I mistakenly booked Sunday NOT Saturday.

And Turgut was attentive to our table in a manner that flowed with our mood. Thank you!

Just a sample of our food.

Steak was AMAZING!!!
Dessert SPECTACULAR!!

Our server Turgut was so attentive and helpful
Made the experience unforgettable!

Canâ€™t recommend enough

Absolutely delicious. Itâ€™s my second time here under this chain restaurant, but the first time in the West Village location. Everything was cooked to perfection and seasoned. We had a great server (Yusuf), who gave us a couple of good recommendations on the starters. Definitely enjoyed.

Beautiful and lively french restaurant in a calm but exciting neighbourhood. When we got there it was very lively and all seating spaces are lovely l, be it the lively outside seating or all the indoor options.

Food was really good and wine pairings were excellent, you can trust the staff to recommend great drinks to acompany the food. A lot of variety on the menu and everyone will find something they will enjoy
Sat outside and was served by Yaman! He was fabulous and was very cautious with my food allergies! Love the service and steak was cooked delicious. Will be back

Absolutely amazing experience!
The wine and desserts were top notch! The atmosphere was elegant yet cozy, and the service from Yusuf and Turgut was outstanding  they made our evening so special. Highly recommend this place! â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸
Shot out to manager for finding us table so quickly!

Great service and an excellent happy hour menu! The tapas are delicious and offered at very affordable prices. I especially love the red wine sangria, churros and stuffed dates. It does get pretty crowded after 6 PM, so Iâ€™d recommend coming a bit earlier for quicker seating and service.

Both the food and the service was great! Yusuf took great care of me - made sure I had what I needed and that I was happy with my meal. Didnâ€™t make me feel rushed even during Saturday brunch. I have nothing but positive things to say!

Boucherie West Village: Style Over Substance

Boucherie in West Village nails the atmosphereâ€”think Parisian elegance meets New York chic. But when it comes to food and service, the experience was underwhelming, especially for diners with dietary needs.

Our order included the gazpacho, Nicoise salad, steak and eggs, a non-alcoholic wheat beer, and sparkling water. The gazpacho was the standoutâ€”cool, bright, and balanced. The Nicoise, while fresh, lacked flair; the tuna was served plain and would have been elevated significantly with a light sear. The steak and eggs were cooked as expectedâ€”decent, but nothing youâ€™d go out of your way to rave about.

Service was courteous but inattentive. Despite informing them of a gluten allergy, we were served gluten bread. Fries, listed as gluten-free, are cooked in shared oil, which is a clear cross-contamination issue. We requested vegetables in place of the roasted potatoes to avoid this risk, but the swap was forgotten and had to be reminded mid-meal. The server also struggled to provide clear ingredient details without prompting, which is disappointing at this level of dining.

For a restaurant that presents itself as upscale and polished, Boucherie needs to do more than just look the part. It should deliver thoughtful service, respect dietary needs without reminders, and offer food that feels more intentional than standard.

A beautiful setting canâ€™t carry a meal aloneâ€”and here, it shouldnâ€™t have to.

#BoucherieNYC #WestVillageDining #GlutenFreeNYC #FoodieTruths #FrenchFoodFail

The restaurant has such a beautiful atmosphere â€” cozy, stylish, and so inviting. âœ¨
The steak frites was perfectly cooked and the onion soup absolutely delicious.
By far the best value for money on our NYC trip!

Iâ€™m a Soho and NYC Native I adore Paris and when I want to reminisce, about the Scott of Lights,  I always come here. The food is sublime, the drinks are perfect and the staff is super attentive, with personal service. I love my lunches here and of course the bar. Thank you guys for making it so wonderful each time. Definitely worth a visit to the West Village.

Overall great experience the drinks are amazing and dessert also !!!!
What truly elevated the experience, though, was the impeccable service. A big thank you to Yusuf and Turgut, who went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and well taken care of throughout the evening. They were friendly, knowledgeable, and genuinely attentive ğŸ˜Š

We had such a great experience thanks to our wonderful waiter, Yaman! He was incredibly friendly, attentive, and gave us amazing recommendations that made our meal even better. He went above and beyond to help us celebrate my cousinâ€™s birthday, and made the whole evening feel extra special. Thank you, Yaman, for your kindness and great service â€” weâ€™ll definitely be back!
Beautiful day on the patio with delicious French brunch and service with Yusuf. Highly recommend it and inside atmosphere is very quaint and fun as well.

From start to finish, our evening at Boucherie West Village was absolutely outstanding. The ambiance strikes the perfect balance between classic Parisian charm and vibrant New York energy â€” warm lighting, lively atmosphere, and an elegant yet inviting vibe that makes you want to stay all night.

A huge thank you to Jerros, the General Manager, for his incredible hospitality and thoughtful accommodations. He went above and beyond to make sure our experience was exceptional, and it truly showed in every detail of the night.

Our waitress, Aliya, was equally wonderful â€” gracious, attentive, and genuinely passionate about the menu. Her recommendations were spot on â€” especially the Filet Mignon and mashed potatoes, which were both cooked to absolute perfection. Every bite melted in our mouths.

The drinks were top-notch, beautifully crafted, and complemented the meal perfectly. From cocktails to dessert, everything exceeded expectations.

Between the incredible food, impeccable service, and warm, welcoming atmosphere, Boucherie continues to be one of the best dining experiences in New York City. A sincere thank you to Jerros and Aliya for making our night so memorable â€” we canâ€™t wait to return!

Cool, elegant, sheik and comfortable vibe.
The food is tasty.  I donâ€™t say great, but a â€œstrong-solidâ€ good.

We had escargot, salad, Wagyu carpaccio and mesclun salad.

We had two good non-alcoholic drinks which were made really well.

Fantastic. Love this place. It's a classy open space. Lots of outdoor seats, also many tables inside.  It has a very nice, large bar.

Excellent cocktails. And decent food.

Dining here is a joy. Can't go wrong!

You feel like you're in Casa Blanca.

I will return often.

Absolutely loved our dinner. The food was outstanding, beautifully presented, and full of flavour. Service was excellent, quick, efficient, and genuinely warm from start to finish. The location is perfect, and the atmosphere lively yet elegant, ideal for both a date night or a group dinner.

The only small drawback is the layout feels a bit cramped, with tables quite close to one another, which slightly affects privacy. Aside from that, everything else was perfect. A solid five-star experience overall-highly recommend!

A little late with this review, but I had brunch here with a very dear friend a couple of weeks ago and the food and service were utterly sublime. My friend had traditional eggs Benedict and I had eggs Norwegian, which is basically eggs Benedict with smoked salmon instead of ham. Honestly, this is the best eggs Benedict Iâ€™ve ever had. These people know what they are doing. And those potatoes with the caramelized onions were banging!  Oh my.  The latte was a work of art and was wonderful.  Iâ€™ll let the pictures speak for themselves.
My girlfriend and I came here for dinner and we loved it. The waiters were very attentive and friendly. Turgut was an amazing waiter and we will come back again.

My second wonderful meal at this amazing place, and this time we were served by Mr. Yaman. With his respectful, polite, and hospitable approach, he made us feel right at home. The food was delicious, and the service team was excellent with their cleanliness and meticulous attitude. We thank Mr. Yaman for his food recommendations and friendly service. This will most likely continue to be a place we visit regularly in the near future. ğŸŒŸ

Thank you Yusuf for having us
Amazing restaurant w good food, we will be back

Hola.. Fuimos a celebrar un cumpleaÃ±os, nos sentamos afuera , la mesa estaba montada para  el servicio tipo express, pero tenÃ­an platos para pan , nos sirvieron el pan , nunca nos dieron paleteros para la mantequilla, tuve que usar el cuchillo y obviamente tenÃ­a mantequilla untada para mÃ­ servicio de comida ( El mesero nunca diÃ³ paletero ni cambio juego de cubiertos ) , ordenamos dos sopas de cebollas ( Fondo de la sopa estaba salado , muy salado, parecÃ­a que tenÃ­a tiempo  ese fondo , ya que la sentÃ­ demasiada asentada y sÃ© cÃ³mo preparar una sopa de cebolla ) , terminamos comiendo la sopa ya que el precio en este lugar es muy cariÃ±oso. Los platos fuertes estuvieron pasables . El mesero fue algo atento , digo algo ya que hizo su trabajo pero resulta que estÃ¡bamos festejando un cumpleaÃ±os, le preguntÃ© si habÃ­a alguna sorpresa para el cumpleaÃ±os, ya saben , algÃºn postre de cortesÃ­a, algo que hiciera ameno el momento, y sÃ³lo nos dijo que no tenÃ­an nada para cumpleaÃ±eros.. Nos hizo una broma que si querÃ­a podÃ­a bailarnos , esa broma estuvo demÃ¡s. Nos ofreciÃ³ la carta de postres pero para cobro y pensÃ© si tienen postres , cualquier postre puede servir de sorpresa para el cumpleaÃ±ero, estÃ© decorado o no , simplemente no quisieron ser gentiles, yo soy Chef , analicÃ© cada situaciÃ³n y dÃ©jeme decirles que si cumplen aÃ±os los invito a no ir a comer aquÃ­, no les importarÃ¡ un pepino. Nuestra cuenta fue de casi $300 dimos buena propina , ya que es exigido pero el mesero que nos atendiÃ³ Turgut , simplemente no hizo mÃ¡s que su trabajo, no estuvo mal pero no fue extraordinario. Pd : No regresarÃ­a mÃ¡s !!
Stopped by for a quick bite. Was greeted by the lovely host and our server Yaman was so warm and welcoming. Our omelette was light and decadent.
I love this place! Everything was gorgeous.The food always fresh and delicious. The staff is attentive and friendly. I felt like I am in France ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· Thank you for come back me in EuropeğŸ‘ŒğŸ»

Boucherie West Village is a gem! The cozy, Parisian-inspired vibe instantly makes you feel welcome, and the staff is spot-onâ€”friendly and helpful without hovering.
The food? Exceptional. Their steak frites is a must: perfectly cooked, juicy, with crispy fries that pair perfectly. We also loved the coq au vin, rich and tender. And the crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e? A sweet, satisfying finish.
In short, itâ€™s a fantastic spot for great food and a warm atmosphere. Definitely worth a visit!
Bartenders and servers were amazing, beautiful spot, delicious food, wonderful drinks. I definitely will come back. Diego, Kerron, Balsa and Timy gave us a perfect night at the Boucherie.

The lunch my friend and I just had at Boucherie was delicious. It gave us the perfect environment to catch up over a delicious meal and drinks. Yusuf was very attentive and made sure to space out our meal perfectly to avoid crowding at the table and bring out our meal at a perfect pace. Thank you for such a great experience Yusuf.

I had such a wonderful experience at Boucherie! The food was delicious â€” everything from the steak frites to the lobster pasta was perfectly cooked and beautifully presented. The atmosphere is warm, lively, and very Parisian.

A special shoutout to my server, Turgut, who was absolutely amazing â€” attentive, kind, and made sure everything was perfect throughout the meal. Exceptional service really made the night even better!

Highly recommend Boucherie for anyone looking for a classic French dining experience in the city.

Probably the best french restaurant with tender and crispy steak. The perfect combination with and amazing bertez sauce to add to the flavor made out of egg, mayo and olive oil.. Totally recommended as a date spot. Better to make reservations as they get very busy..

I would try the rib eye nect time but the standouts was the waygu burger which they can make into a lettuce bun and yum! pretty good fries and steak frits.. I would definitely get the wague carpachio if I were you ;) reference in the picture

The best french food hands down. From the time you enter to the service and the food everything is fantastic. We had the wagyu caprassio, spring veggies , salad, fillet mignon , rack of lamb and everything was cooked to perfection. The place has a very romantic ambience to it
